subject: Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Bernardini is going to pass on the Belmont Stakes and this will be the first Belmont Stakes since 2000 that does not include a Kentucky Derby or a Preakness winner.
snippet: Bernardini is going to pass on the Belmont Stakes and this will be the first Belmont Stakes since 2000 that does not include a Kentucky Derby or a Preakness winner.
